name: Silence 'The Horror Game'
description:
Storyline - 

29th October 2008, you heard some noises coming from the woods, and went to investigate it. But you didn't  knew that you will be kidnapped. 

Requirements-

OS: Windows 7,8,10,11 (Both 32 and 64bit)
Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6700 @ 2.6 GHz or better
Memory: 2 GB
Video: 512 MB DirectX 9.0c
Sound: DirectX 9.0c Compatible Sound Card with Latest Drivers
DirectX: 9.0c
Storage: 1 GB

Please Support by donating and give suggestions for further development.
